item.title: My first blog post
item.description: This is a title This is a smaller title Welcome to my first blog post. The content in this part of the post under the +++ is in the “markdown” format. You can find a great reference/cheat-sheet for markdown syntax at this link this is called a code block big long commands go here Or if you just have a single word/command you want to highlight as code you can do this.

item.title: New Blog
item.description: Welcome to the Encore DevOps blog! We on the DevOps team have been working for about a year and a half building tons of automation solutions for Encore’s Managed Services customers. Up until now we haven’t had a place to publicly showcase the more technical work that we’ve been doing. This blog serves as a new space for our engineers to share their experiences around new and innovating technologies we’re exploring.
